attributes.action: Make zero hour contracts a thing of the past.
attributes.additional_details: Given my personal circumstances I imagine that many others are in the same position. A zero hour contract is not a solid job and a company can let you go with out any questions. This needs to be stopped for the sake of equality and fairness.
attributes.background: Zero hour contracts are a bane of many peoples existence. The insane idea of everyone being fully flexible for any job is unrealistic. I'm a parent and have my son every weekend. I keep getting zero hour contracts because of this despite I can work as many hours as needed Monday to Thursday
